name: MailPop
description:
Mail Pop is a game where you'll have to pound your keyboard to write an email while hilarious and chaotic pop-ups try to make you lose your nerve. Destroy those ads with clicks, type as fast as you can, and achieve enlightenment and maximum relaxation in Mail Pop.

Warm up your fingers while waiting for matchmaking to work its magic.

Hone your aim between games by smashing annoying pop-ups.

Attack with the keyboard or defend with the mouse? Decide which strategy is best in each of the new 4 levels of MailPop.

Discover new types of pop-ups and DESTROY THEM.

Achieve the highest multiplier in the office.

Compose your emails with a clean sweep and send them before time runs out.

Unlock all achievements and be the envy of your colleagues at the coffee machine.
